episode_event_ch0302_00_chiri/4001_1001_:
Sorry for calling you here like this. I’m sure you
were busy.
No, no. I should apologize for my tardiness.
I had a lot of things to do.
Let’s get right down to it, then.

Rachel, go get what we were discussing and bring
it here.
Yessir!
Here ya go. Eat up!
Very well...
My, what an elegant-tasting sweet!

It has a pleasant mouthfeel, and even as its
sweetness and aroma spread gently through my
mouth, it’s still refreshing.
Heh. Right?

I’m actually planning a mass marketing campaign
to promote it as Pasio’s signature sweet.

A sweet of such high quality certainly has the
potential to become a famous local specialty.
However...there’s one thing we’re still working on.

I haven’t decided on a mascot Pokémon to put on
the packaging.

I’d like to consider Pokémon found in Paldea as
candidates as well... Any suggestions?
Hmm... I understand the situation now.

As for the Pokémon most suitable to adorn the
packaging...
Boss!

If that’s what you’re looking for, I’ve gotcha
covered!
Who are—
Hey hey! Rika here, at your service!
episode_event_ch0302_00_chiri/6001_1001_:
Tons of Pokémon are cute and strong—but
Clodsire’s got them all beat!

I’m gonna spread the word about the unbeatable
and lovable charm of good ol’ Rika and Clodsire!
episode_event_ch0302_00_chiri/4002_1001_: This is Rika.

She’s a member of the Elite Four in the Paldea
Pokémon League.

She always supports us, both with her strength
and her personality.
Short, sweet, to the point. Nice to meet you three!

You can call me Rika. No need for fancy titles or
whatnot.
Niiice. It’s, like, so nice to meetcha, Rika!
Well? How exactly do you have us covered?
Glad you asked. With...this!
It’s my lovable partner, Clodsire!
Cute, huh? Don’t you just wanna gobble him up?
...Hm. Not bad.

These sweets are made with milk chocolate,
after all.

And Clodsire certainly looks a bit like a loaf of
chocolate bread.

I think he could work if we’re goin’ for, like, a
gentle, comforting angle.
Exactly! We’re all on the same page here!
Sounds like it’s settled, then!
Hey, waaait!
Who is it now?!

If you need a Pokémon for your packaging, look
no further than Miltank!

’Cause I heard you make that sweet with lots ’n’
lots of Moomoo Milk!

Heh heh! You know your girl Whitney’s always got
the latest info. No gossip gets by me!

Say...you wouldn’t happen to be from Johto,
would you?
I sure am! I’m the Gym Leader of Goldenrod City!
You’re lookin’ at Whitney, the incredibly pretty girl!
But you can just call me Whitney!

Nahahaha! I thought I sensed a Johto vibe coming
from you!

I’m Rika, one of the Elite Four of Paldea. Let’s you
and me be friends, Whitney!
OK! Sounds good to me, Rika!

Wow. It took, like, no time at all for those two to
hit it off.
Hmm...

Both Clodsire and Miltank appear to be the
perfect Pokémon for the packaging of your
signature sweet...

But I’m sure there must be many other prospects
here on Pasio.
What do you all think?

Wouldn’t it be worth holding a competition among
several candidates—not just the two here—and
decide based on the winner?
(*sigh* Up to your old habits again, eh, Boss?)
Well! When you put it like THAT...
Hmm. Good point.

Sure, why not? I’ll hold off on making a decision
for now.

We’ll launch a Pasio-wide public campaign to find
Pokémon to adorn the packaging...
and decide from among those that come forward!
episode_event_ch0302_00_chiri/4003_1001_:
Applicants should submit any photos and videos
that highlight the natural charms of their Pokémon!

We three will personally review them to determine
which Pokémon will appear on the packaging!

This is a chance for your partner Pokémon to
become THE face of Pasio’s local specialty! If you
think yours has what it takes...
then hurry up and apply! Hahahahaha!
episode_event_ch0302_00_chiri/4004_1001_: CUUUUTE! You’re so cute I can hardly stand it!
Well, isn’t this a picture-perfect setting.

Miltank in a grassy meadow... That’s a fitting
image to adorn those sweets.
Rika? Compliments’ll get you nowhere, y’know!

Nahahaha! I’m just scoping out the competition,
is all!

You’re stumped, aren’tcha? Can’t find a good
place to take your photos and videos, huh?
Oof! You saw right through me!

Got it in one. I can’t figure out where to take my
photos and videos of Clodsire...

At this rate, I’m just gonna be milling about Pasio
right up to the deadline!

Twist my arm, why don’tcha...
You better thank me for this, y’hear?
I’ll show you a great spot!
I wanna meetcha on equal ground, Rika!

It’ll be much more satisfying to prove who’s got
the cutest partner by facing off fair and square!
episode_event_ch0302_00_chiri/4005_1001_: Clodsire’s kinda like a relative of Quagsire, right?
Sure. That’s the public perception, I guess.

Well, that’s why I figured a crystal-clear stream
in a forest would make the perfect background!
And here we are! This is—wait, what?
episode_event_ch0302_00_chiri/4006_1001_: Aww! You beat us here?

Huh. Well, wouldn’t you know it... We were just
talking about that Pokémon!

I do see the resemblance to Clodsire—especially
in the cuteness department.
Wow! You won over my Quagsire instantly!
I’m Rika! Nice to meet you!

It’s a pleasure, Rika! I’m Misty, a Gym Leader from
Kanto!

Hey, Misty! Are you and Quagsire also applying
for the mascot Pokémon competition?
Yeah! I think Quagsire would be perfect for it!

She’s got a comforting presence, but she’s also
kinda elegant, don’t you think?
Are you two also applying?

Yeah, we are. We’ve been looking for a good
spot to get some promo shots of Clodsire.

We figured here’d work nicely, but since you got
here first, we’ll go look somewhere else.
Wait a second!

Let’s decide this like proper Pokémon Trainers—
with a battle! Whoever loses, leaves!
Heh... Sounds fun.
OK then! I’ll take you up on that challenge!
That’s the spirit!
I’ll show you what the Tomboyish Mermaid can do!

My policy for battle is...an all-out offensive with
Water-type Pokémon!
That so? Go on, then—gimme all you got!

I’d say I’ll go easy on you, but...I’d be lying!
Think fast!
C’mon, Quagsire! Let’s finish this in one go!
Brace yourself, Clodsire!

Use that trademark toughness of yours to shrug off
their attacks!
I can’t believe you’re still standing after all that!
Now! Time to strike back, Clodsire!
Show that Kanto girl who’s boss!

Wow! I see why the Paldea League made you one
of their Elite Four!
Elite Four?! No wonder you’re so strong...
Hey now, you weren’t half bad yourself, Misty!

You think so? That makes me a little happy—even
though I still lost!

(I’d say she’s about on par with Kofu... No, maybe
even stronger.)

Please, Rika, go right ahead and get the best
possible photos and footage of Clodsire! Showcase
all his best qualities!

You got it! I’ll get the perfect shot to slap on that
packaging!

Not so fast, Rika! Don’t forget about Miltank—your
biggest rival!

Oh, I haven’t forgotten about her—or the rest of
the competition, either! I’ll take you all on!
episode_event_ch0302_00_chiri/4007_1001_:
All right! Pretty pleased with all the photos and
footage we ended up takin’.

Thanks, Whitney—not just for finding that spot, but
for helpin’ out with the shoot, too!

Um, ’cause, you see, we want our Pikachu and
Eevee to get picked to be the sweets mascots!

Yeah! And we wanna get a cool video of ’em
winning a battle!
No prob! We’d be happy to battle you!
Did you get that on video?
You li’l squirts are pretty strong!

Yeah! Keep it up, and you could even end up in
the Elite Four someday!
Yes way! You could totally do it!

Friend of mine’s a kid about your age—and she’s
in the Elite Four right now!

Don’t say anything’s impossible—just go for it!
You both got a lot of potential, so don’t let it go
to waste!

Clodsire and Miltank were pretty darn cute, even
when they lost!

You’re Rika of the Paldea League’s Elite Four, are
you not?
episode_event_ch0302_00_chiri/4008_1001_:
You’re Rika of the Paldea League’s Elite Four, are
you not?
Yeah... How can I help you?

My apologies. I seem to have gotten ahead of
myself. I am Rose, president of the Macro Cosmos
conglomerate.
I’ll get right to the point.

Rika, would you do me the honor of joining
Macro Cosmos?
Wh-whoa! Didja hear that, Rika?!
Macro Cosmos is a huge deal in Galar!

And gettin’ scouted by a company like that...that’s
a huge deal, too!

I’m very impressed by your activity with the
Paldea League.

Specifically, the way you dedicate yourself to work
without personal matters getting in the way...
That’s exactly what my company needs!

I’m certain we can satisfy any requests you may
have regarding your compensation and benefits...
So, what do you say?
Rika! This is the career opportunity of a lifetime!

Sorry, Mr. Rose. That’s a very generous
offer, but...
Whaddya mean “but”?!

Tempting as your offer is, I’d like to stay in my
current position for a little while longer.

’Cause I work with some folks who’d be utterly
lost if I weren’t around, lemme tell ya!

Hmm... I see you won’t be so easily lured away
from your current employer.

That’s terribly disappointing news for our
company, but I wish you the best in your current
endeavors!
Right back atcha, man.
Rika, are you really sure that’s what you want?
Yeah, I’m fine!

Working for the boss with my motley crew of
quirky coworkers makes every day a hoot! I’ll
never get sick of it!
episode_event_ch0302_00_chiri/4009_1001_:
Thank youuu, Rika! I couldn’t have finished this
photo shoot without your help!
No problem. You did the same for me, after all.

Well...I’d say we’ve both got some pretty good
photos and videos now.

All that’s left to do is to submit ’em and wait for
the judges’ decision.
Just so ya know, I still think Miltank is the cutest.

Yeah, well, I still think Clodsire is the ultimate in
cuteness.
Let’s have us a fair, honest competition!

Deal! And no hard feelings either way, no matter
who wins!
And if I lose, I promise I won’t cry for once!
episode_event_ch0302_00_chiri/4010_1001_:
Your partner Pokémon were all so thoroughly
charming that it took quite some time to judge
them...but we’ve finally made our decision!
The winning Pokémon and packaging mascot is...
B-Boss! You entered the contest too?!

I was so moved by your inspiring rivalry that I
simply could not help myself.

We decided our marketing campaign should evoke
an image of affluence and maturity. For that
reason, we chose Glimmora.

Geeta, do you mind coming here and saying a
few words?

I am honored that my partner Glimmora was
chosen to be the mascot Pokémon for this
product.

I know Glimmora will shine brightly as the face of
Pasio’s local specialty.

The sweets featuring Glimmora will be available
for sale soon on Pasio! Grab yours before they
sell out!

Hahahahaha! This will be a huge success—no
doubt about it!
